ResearchProjectDef.label: food processor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the methods to reduce edible material into a paste that's ready for storage and consumption.

ResearchProjectDef.label: liquid food storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Preserve liquified food indefinitely by storing it in specialized deoxygenated, pressurized containers via pipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: expanded food storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build huge, pressurized vats designed to preserve colossal amounts of food indefinitely.

ResearchProjectDef.label: food dispenser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allow for use of liquid food stored in pressurized storage containers in a sanitary and efficient way.

ResearchProjectDef.label: auto feeder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allow for automated distribution of nutrients to an immobile pawn complete with smart dietary control.

ResearchProjectDef.label: improved auto feeder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct and operate an improved version of the automatic dispenser, allowing for more efficient diet management.
